articles.title: Scorching European heatwave turns deadly in Spain and France - BBC
articles.description: Two people are found dead by firefighters in Spain's Catalonia region, with heat-related fatalities in France and Italy.
articles.content:
A wildfire in Spain and high temperatures elsewhere in Europe have claimed another six lives as the continent swelters in temperatures topping 40C.
Two farmers died when they became trapped by flame… [+4695 chars]
